title: Best of The Herd
itunes:title: Best of The Herd
description:
Colin addresses the rumors about Jim Harbaugh potentially returning to the NFL and why now is the perfect time for him to leave college football. He believes Aaron Rodgers should win the MVP but understands why he won't end up being an unanimous selection. He also explains why this super star quarterback has nothing to gain by winning another Super Bowl. Plus, Fox Sports college football analyst Joel Klatt joins the show in studio to discuss Harbaugh's future and to preview the National Championship game between Georgia and Alabama. 

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
